author: alpinevm
content: anybody here have experience with the inner workings of solc? wondering which part of the compilation flow is the most compute intensive: ast or bytecode gen

author: sky.cactus
content: Best to ask on the Solidity forum.

author: ralexstokes
content: depends on how you are paid, but a common way validators are paid from block builders is via a simple eth send transaction and if that eth goes to a smart contract then it could start executing code via the fallback infra
